comments: To be honest do not take this professor unless you have strong knowledge of accounting or you are good in accounting. Other than that, do not take him.

I totally agree, class starts at 8:30AM and end ups at 9:30, 10:00 AM the most. His test reviews are horrible, he actually covers five chapters in half-hour, by the way he doesn\'t talk, he whispers, even when sitting right in front of him you could barely listen to him.
Worst teacher ever, avoid him. For an accouting course he only teaches an hour( it was a weekend class), plus you barely understand his reviews or his lectures.
Good Professor. Ask questions in class. Cares about his students.
Avoid this professor, DO NOT TAKE HIS CLASS
